examples.text: Hello I am looking for some help here
Do you have a list of things I can talk to you about?
Can you tell me what services you are able to help me with?
Can you please give me a list of the types of things you can help me with?
Where can I find the frequently asked questions?
What kinds of things can you do?
What else can you help me with?
What are my options that you can help with?
What are you able to deal with?
What are you able to understand?
What can I ask you to do?
Tell me about what kind of things you do?
Is there anything you can help me with?
I'd like to know what type of questions you can answer for me.
I do not know what to ask
How can you solve my problems?
I don't want to go further
I m not sure what will make you happy
I don t know what you need
To be honest, I m really not sure
I don t know what you want
I have no idea what you are looking for
I m not certain I get what you re saying

intents.description: Indicate no definite answer to a question.

examples.text: What should I know about you?
I want to set up the chat bot for my shop
Do you know who you are?
I need to reset my name
I want to update my profile
Can I set a new nickname?
I would like to refresh my profile
Am I talking to a person or am I talking to an AI?
Are you a human or a bot?
How can you prove you are a human?
Tell me, are you a human or no?
Am I chatting with a human?
Am I talking to a Bot?

intents.description: Ask if speaking to a human or a bot.

examples.text: how do I get in the gym?
Do you have water in your gym?
Can I bring food to the pool?
Do you have an outdoor/ indoor pool?
What is the length of the Pool?
Can I order food at the pool?
Can you tell me a joke?
What do you do for fun?
I would like to put you on hold
Give me a few minutes to get together
Can you give me a moment?

intents.description: Indicate a delay in providing input to the bot.

examples.text: What do you mean by that?
Let's try to say that again more clearly, shall we?
I don't understand what you're saying
Can you say that again please?
I didn't quite understand what you said
I did not quite understand what you gave me
can I get hot tea at breakfast?
When can I go for a swim
Is there a local full service gym?
Hi!  What's the quickest way to get from point A to point B.
Which floor is the gym/pool on?
I'm hungry. Where can I eat?
any good time to go swimming
Do you have an outdoor pool?
Wait! Let's back up few steps and do that again
Hold on! I think I want to do it differently.
I didn't mean to do that actually, let's go back

intents.description: Ask the bot to take one step back.

examples.text: It was nice chatting with you
I d like to stop doing this
Can you recommend a Japanese restaurant?
Can you recommend a restaurant that is not a chain for Italian cuisine?
What local restaurants have happy hour?
Can you recommend some great upscale restaurants outside of the hotel?
What restaurants are in the mall?
can you recommend a restaurant nearby?  i'm looking for "x" cuisine and "x" cost.
Could you give me a recommendation for a good restaurant with Mexican food?
Which restaurants deliver to the hotel?
Recommend me good restaurants close by?
Is there any kind of to go food I can get?
We're looking for a good Chinese restaurant nearby. Any suggestions?
Hi! Where's a hole in the wall restaurant that's not on your list and you would take your family to.
I would like to have dinner at a nice restaurant.  Can you give me some ideas?
Good sitdown reaturants in the area.
Is there a place to buy a toothbrush near here?
Is there a restaurant close by that you would recommend?
Hey I was looking for someplace interesting to go eat; do you know anyplace nearby
What Chinese restaurants deliver to the hotel?
Can you recommend a good restaurant for dinner?
Is there any where I can get food to go around here?
What local restaurants have live music?
Can I walk to that restaurant or do I need to take a cab?
What fast food places are closed by the hotel?
What are the best restaurants to visit that would provide me a taste of the town?
What local restaurants have Jazz music?
What local restaurants have outdoor seating?
Is there a place close that I can walk to for dinner?
Can you recommend a restaurant for dinner? Perhaps chinese food or italian. Within walking distance of the hotel.
Is there a convenience store near here?
Can you recommend a good Italian restaurant?
Can you make a dinner recommendation - we are thinking Italian.
What pizza restaurants deliver to the hotel?
How do I arrange a shuttle or a taxi to the airport?
How can I book a taxi?
how do I turn the ac off in my room
How can I book a cab?
How do I book a large reservation in the restaurant?
Hey can I get some new towels up to my room
How do I arrange a shuttle or taxi to the airport?
How do I adjust the heat/AC in the guestroom?
How do I set the clock alarm in the guestroom?
Are you still here with me?
Did you hear what I said?
Speak to me if you are there.

intents.description: Ask the bot to indicate that it is available.

examples.text: Can I be sure that my stored card details are held securely?
How is my credit card info secured?
How do I know this chat is not a scam?
How do I know if my card info is kept safe?
Do you have protection against hacks?
Why would I trust this chat?
What safety measures are used to ensure that chat is secure?
What guards do you have in place to protect your customer's data?
Is this a trusted chat site?
Is there a reason to distrust this chat?
In what way can I tell if my plastic is safe?
I'd like proof of a secure chat

intents.description: Express concerns about the security of the bot.

examples.text: I'm finding it very difficult to make any of this work
I like the way the documentation is written

it's really horrendous how badly these nodes are documented - There is absolutely no way any body can follow that! Infuriating!
I'm having trouble following the instructions that are given
I love the way that the new breaking news service works!
The watson starter kit is awesome!
I don't think these nodes are very good - or at least they're not documented well.
whats the weather like right now
What is the weather going to be like
watson when this rain will over
the weather is important to me
it's sunny, maybe we don't need the lights

look up the weather in tel aviv
what's the weather out would be to destination
when will the sun come out

Harvard is it going to rain

hi, what is the temperature in milan
what would be the weather 50 km ahead?
How long until the rain ends?
is it a nice day today?
Is it going to rain all day?
is it going to rain for the entire day?
is it going to rain later today
is it going to rain today?
is it going to rain when we arrive?
it is raining, what can you do ?
when will be the rain end ?
when were you there when rain is starch
what time will the weather change

What are the hours of your restaurant?
What time does the lounge/restaurant open

What time can I grab dinner?

What time does the restaurant close?
What are your hours of the restaurant?
What are the hours of the gym?
That is precisely what I was looking for
Affirmative. That's what I'm looking for.

intents.description: Acknowledge that the response satisfies a question.

examples.text: How can I skip the recorded menu and go straight to a live person?

I don't want to talk to you
I need to speak to a representative. How would I go about doing so?
I want an agent to help me
I want to talk to a person
I would like to speak to a human
I would like to speak to someone
Please let me talk to a human being.
Please connect me to a live agent
Is there anyone there I can actually talk to for real?
Please assist me to get to an agent
Can I connect to an agent?
Can I speak to a human please?
Can I speak to a live person?
Can I speak to an advisor?
Yes, take me to a real person

Can you connect me with a real person?
Connect me to a live operator please.
Could you please transfer me to your master?

values.text: When would you like to go to the restaurant?
What kind of restaurant or what food would you like?
Sorry, I am having difficulty helping you, a concierge is going to contact you in less than 2 minutes.
A concierge is going to contact you in less than 2 minutes.
The $hotel_amenity is open from 5am to 11pm
The $hotel_amenity is open from 10am to 9pm.
The $hotel_amenity is open from 5am to 2pm and from 6pm to 1am.
The $hotel_amenity is open from 5am to 8pm.

I understand that you would like to learn more about our hours of operation. You can ask me specifically what hours you are looking for (gym, restaurant, pool, sauna), or you may call the front desk for more information.
The Tokyo restaurant is located 2nd street and open for $mealtime
I understand that you would like to learn more about local restaurant. you may call the front desk for more information.
The Rome restaurant is located 3rd street and open for $mealtime
The Paris restaurant is located 1st street and open for $mealtime
The $hotel_amenity is in the front lobby.
The $hotel_amenity is on the second floor.
The $hotel_amenity is located on the ground floor of the hotel.

I understand that you'd like to locate something in the hotel. Please ask me for the specific amenity you are looking for, (gym, restaurant, pool, sauna) or you may call the front desk for directions.
Good Afternoon!
Good Morning!
Hi!
I am Watson. I can answer questions about the Hotel.
How can I help you today?
Hi, What can I do for you?
Hi! What you would like to do?
Hi! How may I help you?
I didn't understand. You can try rephrasing.
Can you reword your statement? I'm not understanding.
I didn't get your meaning.
